name: Apocalyptic (Pritom Bordoloi)
description:
This game was made in 48 hours for JimJam!

Your goal is to survive as long as possible in the middle of an alien invasion!

Inspired by 'The War of the Worlds' by H G Wells.

Software: Unity (Text Mesh Pro, Post Processing Stack) and Inkscape

Music: The Crow by KAOS
